Interface Value<T extends @Nullable Object>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value
All Superinterfaces:
ReadOnlyValue<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleValue
public interface Value<T extends @Nullable Object> extends ReadOnlyValue<T>
Represents a mutable value of type T.

This class offers basic functionality comparable to the JavaFX ObservableValue class.
